Warranty & Support

Price: $29.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:46:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Christmas Decorations

Christmas Decorations string lights

Christmas Decorations

【Safe and Easy to Use】LED Waterfall Lights output voltage is 29V with UL Certified to ensure safety use. and this outdoor christmas decorations clearance is safe to touch and will keep at a low-temperature state after lighting up for hours. It’s very safe, power-saving, and environmentally friendly.
【8 Lights Modes & IP44 Waterproof】The fairy lights have 8 different light patterns: Combination, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/Flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady on. IP44 waterproof is perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.
【Ideal Gift & Decoration Choice】 This christmas decorations outdoor yard lights can be hung on eaves, porches and trees. Widely use to hanging Christmas tree outdoor, Yards, porches, patio, garden, wall, window, bedroom, living room, wedding, party, birthday, Christmas etc.
【Timer Function & Friendly Service】Built-in timer function, Press the timer button and the indicator light on the controller will light up, which means the lights will automatically light up for 6 hours and turn off for 18 hours. We support 12 month free replacement and provide 24-hour online customer service, please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any question.

Easy to Use

The christmas tree decorations lights have two control ways, which is the mode button of the plug and the remote control. You can adjust the brightness from 100%, 75%, 50%, 25%. According to your actual needs choose the comfortable brightness. It can create a romatic atmosphere for your life.

Low Voltage & UL Certification

This Christmas lights use 29V safety low voltage , which strictly tested and meets the US requirements of string lights UL safety standards, More safety and less power consumption. No danger of electric shock, lower than standard body safe voltage 36V.

Outdoor Waterproof Designed

The high waterproof rating and strong construction is durable enough to stand complex climates, ideal for home decor, holiday outdoor decorations, garden decor for outside, new year decorations and can work normally even in cold winter.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:39:52 UTC – Details)


TOSY 36 and 360 LEDs Frisbee – Extremely Bright Flying Disc, Smart Modes, Glow in The Dark, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, 175g, Perfect Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teenagers
36 SUPER BRIGHT LEDs – 100x brighter than any other light-up discs! Our black plastic disc looks super cool, while the white plastic disc gives you more visibility at night when you throw it outdoor.
SMART MODES & MOTION SENSORS – Easily select the Brightness level and Timer mode you want. LEDs light turns on and off automatically for battery-saving.
RECHARGEABLE – 30-minute charge that lasts up to a thousand throws or a full Ultimate match of 90 minutes. Package includes 1x USB Type C to C cable (charger not included).
175 GRAMS – Our disc meets the Professional Ultimate Frisbee standards for long, straight, precise flights and highly comfortable grip. It is great for freestyle tricks too!
UPGRADE YOUR GAME – Spice up your Christmas shopping list and favorite Frisbee bottle and tossing games (Beersbee, Polish Horseshoes or others) with our highly durable, waterproof and premium discs!

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:37:00 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Safe to Use

Plug the light into any outlet or power source to use the fairy lights.There is a button on the plug that you can use to change the lighting mode and turn the light on and off.

Timer Function

The lights will automatically turn on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

9 x Fixing nails included

With fixing nails included in the package, you can easily fix the light string to the lawn.

8 Lighting Modes

This Christmas light has 8 lighting modes: Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On.

Memory Function

With the memory function, the string light remembers the last mode. If you like the lighting modes which set up last time, and you don’t need to change the mode when turn on the light again.

Perfect Decoration

This is a good helper for Christmas decoration, you can decorate the house, Christmas tree, etc. It is also an excellent gift for your family and friends.

【8 Lighting Modes】：Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On. Press the button on the plug to change to your favorite modes, plug and play.
【IP44 Waterproof】：IP44 waterproof rating Christmas light withstands the weather like rain and snow and can be used outdoors. Note: The plug is not waterproof.
【Safe Guarantee】：UL certified and compatible with most USA standard sockets. It will not overheat even if it works for a long time, safe to touch.
【A Helper for Christmas Decoration】：This Christmas decoration star Icicle Light with a charming lighting effect is a perfect decoration for the Christmas tree, lawn, and courtyard.

Safe to Use

  • Plug the light into any outlet or power source to use the fairy lights.
  • There is a button on the plug that you can use to change the lighting mode and turn the light on and off.

Timer Function

The lights will automatically turn on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

9 x Fixing nails included

With fixing nails included in the package, you can easily fix the light string to the lawn.

Read more

8 Lighting Modes

This Christmas light has 8 lighting modes: Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On.

Memory Function

With the memory function, the string light remembers the last mode. If you like the lighting modes which set up last time, and you don’t need to change the mode when turn on the light again.

Perfect Decoration

This is a good helper for Christmas decoration, you can decorate the house, Christmas tree, etc. It is also an excellent gift for your family and friends.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Price: $69.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:30:48 UTC – Details)


Amazfit Bip 3 pro–the 2022 upgraded smartwatch that guides you toward a healthier, more active, more connected life. The watch packs a 1.69″ super-sized color screen into its super slim and light body for a clear, exquisite viewing experience. It adds 4 Satellite Positioning Systems to provide faster, more accurate positioning. Powerful battery to deliver up to 14 days of battery life. Built-in 60+ sports modes and Target Pace function, making your exercise at a higher level. With a powerful Water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip 3 Pro without worry. Get clear and actionable insights into your health with SpO2 measurement, 24/7 heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis, stress detection, and menstrual cycle tracking. Compatible with Android 7.0 and above & IOS 12.0 and above device.
【Big on Screen, Big on Style】Immerse yourself in the 1.69″ super-large and colorful HD display, and see all your incoming text and calls in awesome, expansive quality. Express more of yourself with 50 plus watch faces and editable watch faces & widgets – or customize with your own photos..Water resistance depth:50 meters
【Explore a Big Open World】The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro smart watch supports 4 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves through the great outdoors with high precision.
【Big on Power】Got a trip coming up? Unplug yourself for up to two weeks with typical usage. The Bip 3 Pro smartwatch packs a powerful battery into its super slim and light body, so you can pack something more fun than a charger into your case.
【Big on Health】It’s the ultimate device for a healthier, more active life that can provide blood-oxygen saturation measurement, monitoring of heart rate all day & abnormal heart rate warnings, stress levels & sleep tracking, as well as recording female menstrual period.
【Smash Bigger Workout Goals】The Bip 3 Pro fitness watch has 60 plus sports modes, allowing you to get data for all your favorite sports, like walking, running and cycling, as well as more freeform workouts like strength training, yoga, and free training.
【Take a Deep Dip with Bip】IP68 drowning your ambition? With its water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip 3 Pro without worry. The watch can even track your activity data with its Open Water Swimming sports mode.



Big on Action




4satellite positioning systems

The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro supports 4 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves through the great outdoors with high-precision.

60+ Sports Modes

Get data for all your favorite sports, like indoor and outdoor walking, running and cycling, as well as more freeform workouts like strength training, yoga, and free training. Take your cardio game to the next level with the watch’s Target Pace function, which lets you set and crush your pace goals.

5 ATM water-Resistance

IP68 drowning your ambition? With its water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip3 Pro, without worry. The watch can even track your activity data with its Open Water Swimming sports mode.

Read more

Big on Health




Go Higher with SpO2 Measurement

Feeling worn out? Or adventuring up to higher altitudes? Be smart and use the watch to easily measure your blood-oxygen saturation in as quick as 25 seconds, to quickly understand your physical state.

Follow Your Heart All Day

Keep an eye on the most important muscle in your body. The watch can monitor your heart rate all day, and let you know if it becomes abnormally elevated. You can even check if you’re working out in your goal heart rate zone.

Dream Big, Dream Bip

Follow your dreams through the light, deep and REM sleep stages. The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro can monitor your sleep quality8, so you can rest well enough to keep making the fitness gains you want.

  • Monitor Sleep Stages & Daytime Naps
  • Track Sleep Breathing Quality
  • Get a Sleep Score in the Zepp App

Read more

Big on Versatility




Express More of Yourself

Immerse yourself in the super-large and colorful HD display and express more of yourself with 50+ watch faces and editable watch faces & widgets – or customize with your own photos.

A Smart Partner for Your Phone

Synchronize it with your phone get SMS/phone call/app notifications and control the music playback/ camera of your phone, right on your wrist. The smart watch will also offer Sedentary Reminders, Do Not Disturb, To-Do List, and weather forecast functions, as well as enabling the setting of alarms and stopwatches.

Connect to the Zepp App

The ZeppApp on your phone conducts health and exercise data display and analysis, features a watch face store, provides system updates for your watch, and facilitates smart device management.

Read more

4.5
Price: $69.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:30:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225°, the arm can be folded 90°, the swivel base can be rotated 160° ，making the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:13:44 UTC – Details)



[More Efficient & Safer Light Sensors]-We use a more advanced monocrystalline solar panel and have upgraded its size. It can now receive, store and release solar energy more efficiently, dramatically increasing the solar energy conversion rate, meaning shorter charging times and longer lighting times. All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether it is raining, foggy or snowing can be used outdoors. Usually it can work up to 10-12 hours after 4-6 hours of charging in direct sunlight.
[Variable Lighting Modes to Create Various Ambiance]-The solar starlight light has 8 different lighting modes that can be adjusted by the ‘mode’ button behind the solar panel. And the built-in memory chip with memory function, every time you turn it on or when the night comes, it will automatically adopt the mode set for you last time. You can adjust to the most suitable lighting mode according to the need for decoration or different situations.
[Extra-Long & Widely Used Outdoor/Indoor String Lights]-The solar LED string lights are 66FT long, the spacing of LED beads is 10cm, and the lead length is 6FT, which can be easily installed in the place where decoration is needed. It can be molded into various shapes for gardens, courtyards, trees, porches, roofs, fences bistros, restaurants, hotels, commercial buildings. It can also be used in weddings, parties, Christmas, New Year parties to create a warm, joyful and festive ambiance.
[Be The Most Responsible Seller]-We are committed to provide you with high quality products. If you encounter any problem in the process of using solar string lights, please feel free to contact us, we will provide 7*24 hours technical service, you just need to send an email to the buyer center, we will reply within 8 hours.NOTE: It will automatically charge and light up at night when the switch behind the solar panel is turned on.

35 RGB + 3 Normal Color Modes: Selfie ring light has 3 conventional lighting(warm light/natural light/cool light)35 RGB colors modes(6 monochrome static + 29 dynamic modes)you can freely switch between 38 color modes. LED ring light is manufactured by ultrasonic welding, sturdy and durable. Lampshade with curved design, soft lighting, bright and transparent, without black spots and shadows.
Exclusive Stepless Speed Regulation & Dimming : Light ring uses press switch control design, can steplessly adjust the speed of light in RGB dynamic mode or steplessly adjust cool light/natural light/warm light in conventional lighting mode. In two modes to adjust the brightness steplessly(1%~100%),if you are not sure, please refer to the picture or user manual.
Patented High Quality Tripod: The ring light tripod has obtained related patents,max height of tripod is 62”, and the overall height can reach 72”. Tripod with ring light compared with other tripods,made of superior aluminum alloy, stable and durable, smaller footprint, only takes 1 second to lock the tripod,easy to use. We are equipped with 1 phone holders, the largest phone holder can be stretched to 3.3″, suitable for all kinds of cell phones.
Best Gifts & Wide Applicability : The ring light with stand and phone holder suitable for makeup, photography, painting, dancing, taking pictures, live stream or acting as fill light, floor lamp, zoom light. The top screw thread of the tripod is 1/4”, can be used as a camera tripod.
USB Ports Power Supply: Ring light with stand needs USB port for power supply, can be used with devices that support USB ports, We recommend using an adapter or wall outlet that outputs 5V/3A current so that the Weilisi light can work at maximum power mode.
Bluetooth Camera Remote: The halo light ring with stand comes with bluetooth camera remote control,you can take pictures or video from a distance,compatible with iOS and Android.We provide 6 months free after-sale replacement service,if you have any questions, please contact us.

[SOLAR CHRISTMAS STAKE LIGHTS] Set of 8 exquisite outdoor solar Christmas decorations boast of 4 shapes of snowflake, reindeer, Xmas tree and stars, featuring 4-changing colors and 8 lighting modes. The outdoor garden decor will give off a vivid and warm light better decorating your yard, and further bringing you a colorful festival atmosphere!
[SOLAR POWERED & LONG WORK TIME] These Christmas pathway lights are solar powered, no need for cables or plugs. Large solar panel equipped with 800mAh high-capacity battery can work for more than 10 hours after being fully charged in sunlight. Christmas decorations outdoor yard stakes are definitely the best alternative for outdoor decorations for the sake of energy conservation. Zero electricity costs, save your money.
[EASY INSTALLATION & USE] No extra operations! Just connect these solar lights parts and stake, then insert into the ground. Please note turn on switch before both recharging and using. Really perfect solar Christmas decorations for the pathway, driveway, patio, backyard, walkway and outdoor landscape lighting to add a warm atmosphere throughout the whole night.
[HIGH QUALITY & ALL WEATHER READY] Outdoor Christmas decorations are more durable being made of ABS material with 8 sturdy stakes. All parts are IP65 waterproof enabled, suitable for both indoor and outdoor using without any worry of water ingress or damage. It works well in hot or cold weather, so you can safely put the lights outdoors, such as garden, yard, patio, pathway.
[AMAZING GIFT & AFTER SALES] These Christmas solar pathway lights are perfect Christmas gifts for mom, dad, husband, wife or friends. They will be amazed at how beautiful they look. The packaging of the solar garden decoration have been enhanced for your gift. If there are any problems with the product or any suggestions for us, please feel free to contact us.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

—Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

—8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

— 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

—Timer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

—Memory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

—Safe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

—IP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. 【IP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS】Perfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
【4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function】Our Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
【Safety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape】UL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
【What You Get & Quality Assurance】1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don’t hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);

var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;

if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;

stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

Features

  • High Brightness: Features shatter-resistant acrylic LED bulbs with a concave lens, for a brilliant burst of light that looks great even from a distance.
  • Much Safer: The working voltage for the LED string light is only 29V, which emits extremely low heat. And the circuit board of adapter with short circuit protection puts your safety first. (All passed the UL588 test.)
  • Economic: Only 6 watts per set, saving money on your energy bills while you enjoy the beauty of brilliant Christmas lights.
  • Built to Last: The LEDs are wrapped with milky white sleeve and hot melt adhesive, that seal out moisture for longer life, and a lifespan up to 50000 hours.

These fantastic ice lights perfectly complement other outdoor decorations like Christmas window lights and help to transform your garden (usually at the front) into a festive grotto, especially when teamed with decorations like Outdoor Christmas decorations.
